run_info.input_toml:
[input]
    read1 = 'input_read1.fq.gz'

[output]
    prefix = 'output'
    format = 'bam'
	report_json = true

[[step]]
    action = 'Report'
    name = 'start'


[[step]]
    action = 'Head'
    n = 100

[[step]]
    action = 'Report'
    name = 'pre_multiplex'


[[step]]
    action = 'ExtractRegion'
    start = 0
    len = 2
    out_label = 'demult'

[[step]]
    action = 'Demultiplex'
    in_label = 'demult'
    output_unmatched = true
	barcodes = 'demultiplex'

[barcodes.demultiplex]
    CT = 'aaaa'
    TT = 'gggg'

[[step]]
    action = 'Head'
    n = 10

[[step]]
    action = 'Report' # max 10 output reads
    name = 'post_multiplex'
